Entries.default: "Word has it the Bardattos are sharpening their daggers."
"They found Orso's body behind the waterfall."
"That idiot Larro? Got himself killed behind the adra mill."
"They say that Larro and Orso were fighting again. Differences to settle."
"And I suppose Larro and his miscreants are at the heart of it?"
"Who else but a Bardatto could have done it? I suppose there will be a reprisal."
"I always hoped that boy would grow out of his foolishness. His poor mother..."
"Sorry I missed it. How did they do?"
"Aye. I don't want to be around when it happens."
"Don't pity Ezzali - she rests on a mountain of coin. Pity the Valeras when they face her wrath."
"Larro shambled away with a decent scar. I'm sure Orso is toasting to his victory."
"Orso got a scar for his troubles. If anything, it's an improvement on that mug of his."
"Not a drop of blood spilled. Someone must have gotten between them."
"Both lads and their retinues were butchered. I could hear the screams from here."
"You suppose right. No good can come of it."
